seo.title: Hotels in Corniglia 2025 | Where to Stay in Cinque Terre
seo.description: Find the best hotels and accommodations in Corniglia. Peaceful village atmosphere, panoramic views, authentic guesthouses and B&Bs.

body.title: Where to Stay in Corniglia
body.subtitle: Limited but charming options. Peaceful atmosphere, vineyard views, and authentic village living.

features.title: Village Guesthouses
features.description: Small family-run guesthouses in historic buildings. Intimate atmosphere with personal service and local recommendations.

features.title: B&Bs with Views
features.description: Bed and breakfasts offering panoramic terraces. Wake up to vineyard or sea views with homemade breakfast.

features.title: Holiday Apartments
features.description: Self-catering apartments for independent travelers. Experience village life with your own kitchen and terrace.

features.title: Vineyard Stays
features.description: Rooms near working vineyards. Peaceful hillside locations just minutes from the village center.

features.title: Quiet Location
features.description: Fewest tourists of all five villages. Enjoy authentic local atmosphere and peaceful nights.

features.title: Hiker's Paradise
features.description: Perfect base for exploring all hiking trails. Central location with easy access to other villages.

body.title: Book Your Corniglia Stay
body.subtitle: Limited options - reserve well in advance for summer months.
